title: Copper sheet in magnetic field connect to battery

content.prompt: A sheet of copper in the plane of the page is connected to a battery as shown above, causing electrons to drift through the copper toward the bottom of the page. The copper sheet is in a magnetic field B directed into the page. P1 and P2 are points at the edges of the strip. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: P1 is at a higher potential than P2.
P2 is at a higher potential than P1.
P1 and P2 are at equal positive potential.
P1 and P2 are at equal negative potential.
Current will cease to flow in the copper sheet.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
